content: Your writing related to me in so many ways, since I recently lost my mom 6 weeks ago. I try to find a pocket in this thing called a heart; so that I can find a flicker of happiness. Just so I can light a small spark and light a fire from deep within and begin to start living again! Thank you for sharing your insights and intellectual writing! — Tomorrow is there to help us cope. It is not a magical remedy. It is just another name for hope. But if we let it, it does work like magic. LOVE THIS POINT YOU MADE!! Regards, Naomi
